overview: As VP of Products, Ethan Prater oversees new project strategy, ongoing product management, and data policy. Ethan joined Jigsaw from Yahoo, where he was Director of Product Marketing. Prior to Yahoo, Ethan worked as Director of Advertising Operations & Client Services at IGN Entertainment, the market leader in web content, community, and subscriptions for males 18-34. Before this, he managed enterprise products at DoubleClick and NetGravity. Ethan earned his MBA from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania and holds a BA in German from Yale University.

relationships.title: VP of Enterprise Products and Integrations
